sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Caterpillar topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.9%.
Year to date, Caterpillar registers a 2.7% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Nike, trading down 1.2%.
Nike is showing a gain of 12.3% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Procter & Gamble, trading down 0.5%, and Goldman Sachs Group, trading up 0.6% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
